name: Bug Splat!
description:
!!!!VIRUS DETECTED!!!!

Multiple malicious viruses have infected your phone! Take control of the ‘Antiv1rus’ force to eliminate the onslaught of foreign bugs and save your device!

Fight endless waves of enemies which gradually grow in strength, utilising a deadly arsenal of weapons with different firing methods and stats to handle the hoard of viruses and bugs. Defeat enemies to increase your score and survive longer to increase your score multiplier in order to earn Credits and upgrade your firepower! Come back stronger and survive longer!
